meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Farrish Jeffrey Wachs Mark Japinga Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6652.

td.p: Amanda Farrish, a public relations associate from Vernon, Connecticut
Jeffrey Wachs, an attorney from Irvine, California
Mark Japinga, a legislative researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 3-day cash winnings total $76,700)

tr.td: CHIEF JUSTICES OF THE U.S.
LEND AN "EAR"
WRITERS' HOBBIES
WHO'S YOUR CADDIE?
PUSH & PULL
(Alex: Information and recipes from the book with that title.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 2005 he became Chief Justice without ever being an associate justice')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 2005 he became Chief Justice without ever being an associate justice
